SQLSelect.Command: select tblmain.IDASSET, tblmain.IDENTIFIER, tblmain.DISPLAYNAME, tblmain.DESCRIPTION, tblmain.IDC, tblmain.IDA_CSS, tblmain.IDM, mk.IDENTIFIER as MARKET, tblmain.PERIODMLTPSTLDOFFSET, tblmain.PERIODSTLDOFFSET, tblmain.DAYTYPESTLDOFFSET, tblmain.IDM_RELATED, tblmain.IDM_OPTIONS, tblmain.IDI, tblmain.PARVALUE, tblmain.SYMBOL, tblmain.SYMBOLSUFFIX, tblmain.RICCODE, tblmain.BBGCODE, tblmain.SECURITYGRP, tblmain.SECURITYCLASS, tblmain.CFICODE, tblmain.ISINCODE, tblmain.NSINTYPECODE, tblmain.NSINCODE, tblmain.OTHER1TYPECODE, tblmain.OTHER1CODE, tblmain.OTHER2TYPECODE, tblmain.OTHER2CODE, tblmain.DTISSUE, tblmain.IDC_ISSUE, tblmain.IDCOUNTRY_ISSUE, tblmain.STATEPROVINCEISSUE, tblmain.LOCALEOFISSUE, tblmain.IDA_ISSUER, tblmain.PERIODMLTPEXDIVOFFSET, tblmain.PERIODEXDIVOFFSET, tblmain.DAYTYPEEXDIVOFFSET, tblmain.RELTOEXDIVOFFSET, tblmain.DETERMINMETHOD, tblmain.VALUATIONTIMETYPE, tblmain.ASSETMEASURE, tblmain.QUOTEUNIT, tblmain.RATESRC, tblmain.RATESRCPAGE, tblmain.RATESRCHEAD, tblmain.TRANSACUNIT, tblmain.ISCERTIFICATED, tblmain.ISCOVER, tblmain.ISDEMATERIALISED, tblmain.ISIMMOBILISED, tblmain.ISQUOTED, tblmain.ISFUNGIBLE, tblmain.ISBEARER, tblmain.ISREGISTERED, tblmain.ASSETCLASS, tblmain.VERSION, tblmain.UNITTYPEWEIGHT, tblmain.IDAINS, tblmain.IDAUPD, tblmain.DTINS, tblmain.DTUPD, tblmain.DTENABLED, tblmain.DTDISABLED, tblmain.EXTLLINK, tblmain.ROWATTRIBUT, tblmain.ROWVERSION from dbo.ASSET_EQUITY tblmain left outer join dbo.MARKET mk on (mk.IDM = tblmain.IDM) and (mk.ISEQUITYMARKET = 1)

SQLWhere.SQLJoin: left outer join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT sri on sri.ID=tblmain.IDI and sri.CLASS='INSTRUMENT' and sri.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
left outer join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT sra on sra.ID=tblmain.IDA_ISSUER and sra.CLASS='ACTOR' and sra.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
left outer join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT srm on srm.ID=tblmain.IDM and srm.CLASS='MARKET' and srm.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
left outer join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT srm2 on srm2.ID=tblmain.IDM_RELATED and srm2.CLASS='MARKET' and srm2.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
left outer join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT srm3 on srm3.ID=tblmain.IDM_OPTIONS and srm3.CLASS='MARKET' and srm3.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
SQLWhere.SQLWhere: ( ((tblmain.IDI is null) or (sri.ID is not null)) and ((tblmain.IDA_ISSUER is null) or (sra.ID is not null)) and ((tblmain.IDM is null) or (srm.ID is not null)) and ((tblmain.IDM_RELATED is null) or (srm2.ID is not null)) and ((tblmain.IDM_OPTIONS is null) or (srm3.ID is not null)) )

tblmain.MARKET='%%DA:MARKET.GetDataValue()%%' and isnull(tblmain.IDI,%%DA:IDI.GetDataValue()%%)=%%DA:IDI.GetDataValue()%% and exists ( select 1 from dbo.ASSETENV ae where (ae.IDI=%%DA:IDI.GetDataValue()%%) and ((ae.IDM is null) or (tblmain.IDM = ae.IDM)) and ((ae.IDC is null) or (tblmain.IDC = ae.IDC)) and ((ae.IDCOUNTRY is null) or (tblmain.IDCOUNTRY_ISSUE = ae.IDCOUNTRY)) and ((ae.SECURITYGRP is null) or (tblmain.SECURITYGRP = ae.SECURITYGRP)) and ((ae.SECURITYCLASS is null) or (tblmain.SECURITYCLASS = ae.SECURITYCLASS)) and ((ae.CFICODE is null) or (isnull(tblmain.CFICODE,ae.CFICODE) like ae.CFICODE)) and (ae.DTENABLED<=getdate() and (ae.DTDISABLED is null or ae.DTDISABLED>getdate())) )

isnull(tblmain.IDI,%%DA:IDI.GetDataValue()%%)=%%DA:IDI.GetDataValue()%% and exists ( select 1 from dbo.ASSETENV ae where (ae.IDI=%%DA:IDI.GetDataValue()%%) and ((ae.IDM is null) or (tblmain.IDM = ae.IDM)) and ((ae.IDC is null) or (tblmain.IDC = ae.IDC)) and ((ae.IDCOUNTRY is null) or (tblmain.IDCOUNTRY_ISSUE = ae.IDCOUNTRY)) and ((ae.SECURITYGRP is null) or (tblmain.SECURITYGRP = ae.SECURITYGRP)) and ((ae.SECURITYCLASS is null) or (tblmain.SECURITYCLASS = ae.SECURITYCLASS)) and ((ae.CFICODE is null) or (isnull(tblmain.CFICODE,ae.CFICODE) like ae.CFICODE)) and (ae.DTENABLED<=getdate() and (ae.DTDISABLED is null or ae.DTDISABLED>getdate())) )

Condition.SQLWhere: ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR in ('CSS') and ACTORROLE.IDA in (select IDA from dbo.CSS where CSSTYPE in ('SECURITIES','CASH-SECURITIES'))

Information.ToolTipMessage: FpML:\r\nA short form unique identifier for an exchange. If the element is not present then the exchange shall be the primary exchange on which the underlying is listed. The term "Exchange" is assumed to have the meaning as defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions.

FIX:\r\nTag 461 CFICode.\r\nIndicates the type of security using ISO 10962 standard, Classification of Financial Instruments (CFI code) values. ISO 10962 is maintained by ANNA (Association of National Numbering Agencies) acting as Registration Authority. See "Appendix 6-B FIX Fields Based Upon Other Standards". See also the Product (460) and SecurityType (167) fields. It is recommended that CFICode be used instead of SecurityType (167) for non-Fixed Income instruments.\r\nA subset of possible values applicable to FIX usage are identified in "Appendix 6-D CFICode Usage - ISO 10962 Classification of Financial Instruments (CFI code)"\r\nTag 1248 DerivativeCFICode.\r\n20022:\r\nCFI.\r\nClassification type of the financial instrument, as per the ISO 10962 Classification of Financial Instrument (CFI) codification.

Example:
IBM INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS MACHINES CORP.
Common Shares

ESVUFR

E = Equities
S = Shares, i.e. common/ordinary
V = Voting
U = Unrestricted (no ownership/transfer restrictions)
F = Fully paid
R = Registered


For more information

FIX: Tag 48 SecurityID. Security identifier value of SecurityIDSource (22) type (e.g. CUSIP, SEDOL, ISIN, etc). Requires SecurityIDSource. Tag 22 SecurityIDSource.Identifies class or source of the SecurityID (48) value. Required if SecurityID is specified. 20022: ISIN. International Securities Identification Number (ISIN). A numbering system designed by the United Nation's International Organisation for Standardisation (ISO). The ISIN is composed of a 2-character prefix representing the country of issue, followed by the national security number (if one exists), and a check digit. Each country has a national numbering agency that assigns ISIN numbers for securities in that country.

FIX: Tag 48 SecurityID. Security identifier value of SecurityIDSource (22) type (e.g. CUSIP, SEDOL, WertPapier, etc). Requires SecurityIDSource. Tag 22 SecurityIDSource.Identifies class or source of the SecurityID (48) value. Required if SecurityID is specified. 20022: NSIN. National Securities Identification Number (NSIN): Cusip (US, CA), Sedol (UK), Wertpapier (DE), Valoren (CH), Quik (JP)...
